bibl.title: The Epistrategos in Ptolemaic and Roman Egypt. Part 2. The Roman Epistrategos.
bibl.seg: Thomas J. David, The Epistrategos in Ptolemaic and Roman Egypt. Part 2. The Roman Epistrategos. (Papyrologica Coloniensia. VI, 2.)

C.R. par H.W. Pleket, TG 97 (1984) pp. 239-240. - Günter Poethke, DLZ 107 (1986) coll. 48-49. - Jean A. Straus, Latomus 46 (1987) pp. 878-880. - Revel Coles, CR N.S., 34 (1984) pp. 93-94. - Giovanni Geraci, Aegyptus 65 (1985) pp. 233-235. - Eckart Olshausen, Gnomon 56 (1984) pp. 662-664. - Johannes Herrmann, AKG 69 (1987) pp. 473-474 (non vidimus).
